reviews.review_msg: She is an amazing teacher. Her classes are interesting because she explains the topics clearly and encourages interaction. She communicates effectively and provides straightforward information. Her sense of humor makes her class even more enjoyable, and her exams are well-designed.

We learned so muchâ€”it was a great class with Sharla! being able to drop the final! 
it helps us socialise and truly engage with the environment!
So friendly, Knowledgeable, Helpful office hours, Respecting where we came from! On time! The best course assessment!
But : A LOT OF THINGS TO DO and she has high standards in grading. TAKE HER!

She cares about students, and if you don't understand something, come and ask her; she will try to explain it. Even though she requires you to watch her videos at home, it helps you memorize the lecture notes in detail (active studying). Remember what she says in class (tutorials and labs) and during the field trips; she'll include it in the exam
she is very inspiring and kind, although the class average is low if you do the homework and study her materials you can get good grades.
nice prof and willing to help , but I feel like shes a tough grader tho
A lot of homework and in the assignment/homework, you could lost some points for "ridiculous" reason. also she assume that the class know "everything" and dont event talk about that topic

She can communicate well, she gets across ideas fluidly. I emailed her several times and got responses within 24 hours. If you are in her class, utilize the feedback that she gives you, I feel her unique trait from other profs is how you can ask her questions and she will break it down well, keeping your understanding in mind.

104 is a super cool course. Super little reading, just watch lecture videos and go to class, low workload relative to some other courses i have taken. And you get to learn abt climate change, important subject fr.

She made studying biology so much easier than it actually was. Such a polite human being and always willing to help students in any way possible. One of the professors who actually care about their students. Would def recommend.
Terrible professor, NEVER take her course again
great instructor, always provide a clear explanation if have any questions

Took the ASYNC course, presentations are very clear, recorded lectures are short, wasn't too difficult to keep up with, although there was a lot of homework assigned weekly (pretty easy though). Would recommend for both required course and elective.
fair grader

Seldomly tell something useful in class. Every course just puts students into the discussion room. There is never a delay in the submission of assignments, submission gap is only open for one hour, and this gap is often changed without reminding. Email reply speed is extremely slow, usually needs a week's wait for her replaying.

Prof. Sharla's a great teacher. She's open and clear about her lectures. She'll definitely clear all the doubts you've got, both academic & personal. But she's kinda unprofessional when it comes to emails and at times she's a tough grader. DON'T EVER TAKE THIS CLASS EASY cuz she wants her students to actually learn something when doing projects.
Anyway, I would never take her class again. LOOK FOR TROUBLE
She is so inspirational and all her essays and tests are very easy to get good grades in. she also really understands where you are coming from and is very caring

One of the best instructors FIC has. Her classes are super engaging and she does a really good job of making sure you do not get bored at any point. I would highly recommend taking her courses. Not only will you learn a lot, but they are great GPA boosters too.

Takes long to respond to emails and sometimes won't respond at all. When she does, little help is actually provided. Grading rubrics are very vague and I often got no feedback about marks lost. Never received final exam mark and am unaware of how I got the mark I did. 2nd project marked CONSIDERABLY harder than 1st. Many grammar errors in slides.

This course had a heavy course load but the marking was very fair. The prof is very fair with her marking as long as you work for it. Many students didnt reach out to her and ended up getting a bad grade on their final group project. This class is great as long as you keep in touch with the prof!

Outdated slides with old and irrelevant information. The professor doesn't mark assignment on time. The marking is delayed to several weeks. Doesn't appreciate the child's efforts in the assignments. Very tough grader. The marking scheme in this course is not worth the amount of work the child has to put in this course. Gives poor feedback.

We had an open book midterm and final. Quizzes/Assignments were okay but really time-consuming and her expectations varied at times, sometimes she'd mark super easy and other times more harshly. Our first group project was marked fairly easy, where as the last group project was marked very unfairly and dropped the entire class average.
She is not understanding when it comes to your grade, and if you need help forget it she won't reply to your emails for at least 4 days.

This class was online and has a test each week and an assignment plus 2 group projects and a midterm and final. so lots of work, the thing that sucks is her grading rubrics given to you before and after projects may not match. She doesn't respond quickly to questions and you cant contact TA.

sharla is nice and enjoys teaching but she doesn't give enough time for quizzes. the whole course is basically just assignments. you won't hear back from her after 2-3 days and she doesn't really answer questions. fairly easy. the grading for assignments is a little wack. just make sure you do the lectures and assignments. can't contact ta's either

little to no feedback is given. Takes a long time to respond to discussion/emails which is frustrating. timed quizzes were a pain if you asked her for more time she doesn't do anything. You can't contact TAs and if you contact her expect nothing but a reply saying she can't do anything . also don't expect her to spell your name right in emails.
She is just AMAZING!

Shes really nice and I will take her other classes as well but you need to study hard for her midterms and exams. The group presentation is really important for her so take it seriously and also the lab lecture ls are very important.
I always love her classes

So I took this course at FIC. If there's 1 thing I'm sure about her, she is in love with bio! She's very good at explaining, open to ALL SORTS of questions(easy or tough; won't get upset) and answers happily and if she doesn't know the answer, she'll tell you. She really inspired me about nature, conservation and many more. She is really amazing.

An amazing teacher! Notes are pretty much straightforward and understandable. Her midterm(s) are also quite relevant to the notes, unlike most teachers midterms. Wish she could teach me majority of my courses!
The greatest professor, kind and active. Her teaching skill is awesome, there is no student who sleeps in her class, because its really interesting. Not tuff grader. No much homework.
SHE IS AMAZING
Besttt
The best prof in FIC!!!

Super great instructor!!! She always tries her best to support students. Very passionate. Inspire students. She considers us as her children. She hopes that she can do something to change this world become better. Love her so muchhhhhhh !!
Just take a moment to think about it - wow how amazing it is! A very passionate, excited professor who can make you interested in her course. You cant find anyone better than her in FIC.
Good prof. The only problem is that there are too much useless information in slides and you need to figure out what is going to be in the exam.

She is always passionate about what she teaches, unlike a machine. She shares her own life experience as teaching, which makes her unique from others. In the courses, we discussed and learnt together, rather than only me learnt. She doesn't only teach us knowledge but also encourage us to use the knowledge learnt to influence the surrounding world!
She is a really great teacher and her field trip is truly inspirational. You won't regret taking this course!
She want you use words in class concept on your project and exam
She is so inspirational. After taking her class and take about agriculture and geography stuff, I've been motivated to became a vegetarian.
Lecturer who really passionate in what she's teaching  Friendly and helpful  Interesting lectures which are very life-changing try your best to have your bio with her if possible

SHARLA IS A WONDERFUL LECTURER, ALWAYS THERE TO EXPLAIN FOR YOU AND TRIES TO MAKE THE COURSE AS EASY AS SHE CAN. JUST DO YOUR LABS AND STUDY HARD.  ALSO IF YOU KNOW ANYONE GOOD IN YOUR CLASS FEEL FREE TO ASK THEM OR ASK SHARLA HERSELF. SHE IS REALLY WONDERFUL. IT COULD BE TOUGH AT TIMES THOUGH AND PARTICIPATION MATTERS.
She is the best teacher Ever  :) I Would like to take course again and again by mam Sharla
she was such a helpful prof and fun field trips in semester!!!! really helpful with answering questios

Awesome professor! Inspires you! Motivates you! You don't even have to open the textbook if you just listen to her in class. Read the slides, understand the material and do you lab. The best course! Teaches you a lot of things!  Super friendly and an amazing prof! She's passionate, cute and a wonderful teacher! Do take it!
Awesome

Nice prof, can feel her passion in teaching. Midterms are not difficult as long as you participate in classes. Lab sessions are very important because most of the materials tested were from the lab manual.
She is the best prof. I even seen! I like her class and the way she teach!!!

She is enthusiastic for biology and science, and also make every students in her class be enthusiastic for them.if you wanna fall in love in biology, take her course, because you will think the knowledge she taught is very interesting and useful.Her teaching skill is perfect, every questions you asked can be answered specificly by her.
Enthusiastic teacher. Pay attention and do your readings. You'd surely ace d course. Try and be specific when answering essay style questions, else you'd lose mark.
Very cool teacher, makes you want to study and understand, very helpful, and she explains until she makes sure u understand, simply my favorite teacher!!!
THis is my favorite teacher of all time until now. explains perfectly!!

she's very good teacher, she's the kind of teachers that love her subject and with that make you love it too. the exams were tough because the course is kind of heavy. but she explain things well. if you study well you should do good at it!
